SEARCH
Module Actividad_AE02
Package utils

Class XmlProcessor

java.lang.Object
utils.XmlProcessor
public class XmlProcessor extends Object
The XmlProcessor class provides methods for handling XML files. It includes functionality to generate XML files, parse XML content, and generate XML representations from data.

  • Constructor Details

    • XmlProcessor

      public XmlProcessor()

  • Method Details

    • generateXmlFile

      public void generateXmlFile(String country, String xmlContent)
      Generates an XML file with the provided content and saves it in the "xml" directory.
      Parameters:
      country - The name of the country to be used as the filename for the XML file.
      xmlContent - The XML content to be written to the file.

    • parseXmlContent

      public String[] parseXmlContent(File xmlFile) throws Exception
      Parses the content of an XML file and extracts specific data fields into an array. The method expects the XML to have tags for country, population, density, area, fertility, age, urban, and share.
      Parameters:
      xmlFile - The XML file to be parsed.
      Returns:
      An array of strings containing the extracted data from the XML file.
      Throws:
      Exception - If there is an error parsing the XML file.

    • getXmlDirectory

      public File getXmlDirectory()
      Returns the directory where XML files are stored.
      Returns:
      The directory where XML files are located.

    • generateXmlContent

      public String generateXmlContent(String[] row)
      Generates an XML content string from the provided row of data.
      Parameters:
      row - The array of data to be converted to XML format.
      Returns:
      The generated XML content as a string.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the row has insufficient data.
